title: Tabular Data Viewer Extension
description: Settings for the Tabular Data Viewer Extension. Supports Parquet, Excel, CSV, and TSV files.

enableParquet.title: Enable Parquet files
enableParquet.description: Use this extension to view .parquet files

enableExcel.title: Enable Excel files
enableExcel.description: Use this extension to view .xlsx files

enableCSV.title: Enable CSV files
enableCSV.description: Use this extension to view .csv files

enableTSV.title: Enable TSV files
enableTSV.description: Use this extension to view .tsv files

maxCellCharacters.title: Maximum Cell Characters
maxCellCharacters.description: Maximum number of characters to display in a cell before truncating with '...'. Set to 0 for no limit.

maxUniqueValues.title: Maximum Unique Values
maxUniqueValues.description: Maximum number of unique values to display in filter dialog and statistics. Set to 0 for no limit.

enableDownloadOriginal.title: Enable Download Original Format
enableDownloadOriginal.description: Allow downloading data in original file format (Parquet, Excel, CSV, TSV)

enableDownloadExcel.title: Enable Download Excel Format
enableDownloadExcel.description: Allow downloading data as Excel (.xlsx) file

enableDownloadCSV.title: Enable Download CSV Format
enableDownloadCSV.description: Allow downloading data as CSV (.csv) file
